Resources FAQ Subcategory 1

When does an investor begin to earn distributions?

We will calculate our monthly distributions based upon the week an investor purchases shares in RW Holdings NNN REIT, Inc. Therefore, investors will receive a pro-rated distribution at the end of the first partial month during which they acquired shares. The payment of any distributions, and that profits will be obtained from your investment, are not guaranteed.
